Item.comments: Checks if a named HCAras Property is enabled for all/identity
Item.method_code:
'MethodTemplateName=VBMain;
' Checks for the name "inputName" in the HC Properties and evaluets if it is enabled or not.
Function Main() As Item
Dim inn as Innovator = Me.getInnovator() Dim boolString As String Dim inputName As String = Me.node.InnerText
If IsEnabled(inputName) Then boolString = "TRUE" Else boolString = "FALSE" End If
Dim result As Item = inn.newResult(boolString) Return result
End Function
Private Function IsEnabled(ByVal propertyName As String) As Boolean Try Dim myProp As Item = GetPropertyItem(propertyName)
' If user is part of the enabled_id, check the enabled_for_identity property ' Else use the enabled property
Dim enabledProperty As String = "enabled"
Dim idIdentity = myProp.getProperty("enabled_identity", "") If idIdentity <> "" Then 'Note: If no idIdentiry is set the standard enabled will be used If CCO.Permissions.IdentityListHasId(Aras.Server.Security.Permissions.Current.IdentitiesList, idIdentity) Then ' User is a part of the identity enabledProperty = "enabled_for_identity" End If End If
Dim enabled As String = myProp.getProperty(enabledProperty, "1") Dim res As Boolean = If(enabled = "1", True, False) Return res Catch ex As Exception CCO.Utilities.WriteDebug("ERROR_HC_IsPropertyEnabled_Generic", ex.ToString()) Return True End Try
End Function
Private Function GetPropertyItem(ByVal name As String) As Item Dim amlQuery As New StringBuilder amlQuery.Append("<AML><Item action='get' type='HC Properties' >") amlQuery.AppendFormat("<name condition='eq'>{0}</name>", name) amlQuery.Append("</Item></AML>") Dim result = Me.getInnovator().applyAML(amlQuery.ToString) Return result End Function
Item.name: HC_IsPropertyEnabled_Generic
